NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 YARROW: We're here at last! 2 1 YARROW: Oh, Clary, that was dreadful! I am immensely relieved to be rooted firmly by gravity again.. 3 2 YARROW: I am deeply impressed by the fortitude of the Nomai living on Brittle Hollow.. The possibility of drifting endlessly in zero-gravity after falling into the black hole would terrify me daily! 4 3 CLARY: Oh, everyone begins their time on Brittle Hollow quite terrified of that possibility.. I'm sure you'll become accustomed to it with time as well! 5 4 CLARY: Still, it means a lot that you were willing to face your fears to join me here, Yarrow.. 6 5 CLARY: You must be terribly eager to learn about the warp towers! I'm overjoyed to have found a friend as passionate about warp technology as I am!
